properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT t.R_ASIN as SERIRES_NAME , t.DAY_PAGEVIEWS,t.START_TIME,t.END_TIME FROM ( SELECT spfd.PARENT_ASIN AS R_ASIN ,spfd.*,spf.START_TIME,spf.END_TIME FROM sc_product_flow spf , sc_product_flow_details spfd WHERE spf.id = spfd.TASK_ID AND ( spfd.SKU IS NULL OR spfd.SKU = '' ) AND ( spfd.ASIN IS NULL OR spfd.ASIN = '' ) UNION SELECT spfd.PARENT_ASIN AS R_ASIN,spfd.* ,spf.START_TIME,spf.END_TIME FROM sc_product_flow spf , sc_product_flow_details_history spfd WHERE spf.id = spfd.TASK_ID AND ( spfd.SKU IS NULL OR spfd.SKU = '' ) AND ( spfd.ASIN IS NULL OR spfd.ASIN = '' ) ) t WHERE t.PARENT_ASIN IN ( SELECT saap.ASIN FROM sc_real_product_rel srpr,sc_amazon_account_product saap WHERE saap.SKU = srpr.SKU AND srpr.REAL_ID = '{@#realId#}' ) ORDER BY t.START_TIME, t.R_ASIN

SELECT DISTINCT t.R_ASIN as SERIRES_NAME , t.DAY_PAGEVIEWS,t.START_TIME,t.END_TIME FROM ( SELECT CONCAT_WS('/',spfd.PARENT_ASIN,spfd.ASIN ) AS R_ASIN ,spfd.*,spf.START_TIME,spf.END_TIME FROM sc_product_flow spf , sc_product_flow_details spfd WHERE spf.id = spfd.TASK_ID AND ( spfd.SKU IS NULL OR spfd.SKU = '' ) AND ( spfd.ASIN is not null and spfd.ASIN != '' ) UNION SELECT CONCAT_WS('/',spfd.PARENT_ASIN,spfd.ASIN ) AS R_ASIN,spfd.* ,spf.START_TIME,spf.END_TIME FROM sc_product_flow spf , sc_product_flow_details_history spfd WHERE spf.id = spfd.TASK_ID AND ( spfd.SKU IS NULL OR spfd.SKU = '' ) AND ( spfd.ASIN is not null and spfd.ASIN != '' ) ) t WHERE t.ASIN IN ( SELECT saap.ASIN FROM sc_real_product_rel srpr,sc_amazon_account_product saap WHERE saap.SKU = srpr.SKU AND srpr.REAL_ID = '{@#realId#}' ) ORDER BY t.START_TIME, t.R_ASIN

SELECT DISTINCT t.R_ASIN as SERIRES_NAME , t.DAY_PAGEVIEWS,t.START_TIME,t.END_TIME FROM ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN CONCAT_WS('/',spfd.PARENT_ASIN,spfd.ASIN,spfd.SKU) AS R_ASIN ,spfd.*,spf.START_TIME,spf.END_TIME FROM sc_product_flow spf , sc_product_flow_details spfd WHERE spf.id = spfd.TASK_ID AND spfd.SKU IS NULL OR spfd.SKU = '' UNION SELECT CONCAT_WS('/',spfd.PARENT_ASIN,spfd.ASIN ,spfd.SKU) AS R_ASIN,spfd.* ,spf.START_TIME,spf.END_TIME FROM sc_product_flow spf , sc_product_flow_details_history spfd WHERE spf.id = spfd.TASK_ID AND ( spfd.SKU is not null and spfd.SKU != '') ) t WHERE t.SKU IN ( SELECT srpr.SKU FROM sc_real_product_rel srpr WHERE srpr.REAL_ID = '{@#realId#}' ) ORDER BY t.START_TIME, t.R_ASIN
